title: Erythromelalgia: Clinical Overview and Characteristics
short_description: Clinical document describing erythromelalgia, a rare condition causing intense burning pain, redness, and increased temperature in the extremities.
long_description: This clinical document provides a comprehensive overview of erythromelalgia, a rare medical condition that primarily affects the feet and hands. The document details the characteristic symptoms including intense burning pain, severe erythema (redness), and elevated skin temperature in affected extremities. It explains the etymology of the condition's name and notes that while typically bilateral, the condition can sometimes be unilateral. The document emphasizes the variable nature of the disease course and its episodic or continuous presentation patterns, serving as an educational resource for understanding this uncommon but significant medical condition.
